ContentStructure.title: Information Security Awareness Quiz Love Your Online Life
Take our Security Quiz to test your knowledge.   Click on Begin to start.
Begin Trigger this button to go to the next slide
Brought to you by the Information Security Branch  Office of the Chief Information Officer
1.  What is the most important advice to always follow regarding passwords?
Keep different passwords for each account

answer.title: Keep different passwords for each account

ContentStructure.title: Combine upper and lower case in your password

answer.title: Combine upper and lower case in your password

ContentStructure.title: Correct - Answer:  A  Every day, online accounts are breached, with user names and passwords sold on the dark web. A hacker who gets your user name and password for one account will try it for numerous others because they count on the fact that people use the same password for multiple accounts.  Click anywhere or press ‘y’ to continue.

Correct - Answer:  A  Every day, online accounts are breached, with user names and passwords sold on the dark web. A hacker who gets your user name and password for one account will try it for numerous others because they count on the fact that people use the same password for multiple accounts.  Click anywhere or press ‘y’ to continue.
You must answer the question before continuing.

question.title: Multiple Choice
question.text: 1.  What is the most important advice to always follow regarding passwords?

ContentStructure.title: 2.  More and more often, online companies are offering to “save your password”, probably to encourage people to create stronger passwords. Should you use this service?
Yes, it will make things easier

answer.title: Yes, it will make things easier

ContentStructure.title: No, there are too many data breaches

answer.title: No, there are too many data breaches

ContentStructure.title: Correct - Answer:  B  Unfortunately, there is no guarantee that your ‘saved’ password will be safe. Hackers have stolen thousands of credentials from companies who failed to encrypt their users’ passwords. Personal responsibility is always the best policy. Avoid ‘save my password’ or ‘remember me’ offers.  Click anywhere or press ‘y’ to continue.

Incorrect - Answer:  B  Unfortunately, there is no guarantee that your ‘saved’ password will be safe. Hackers have stolen thousands of credentials from companies who failed to encrypt their users’ passwords. Personal responsibility is always the best policy. Avoid ‘save my password’ or ‘remember me’ offers.  Click anywhere or press ‘y’ to continue.
You must answer the question before continuing.

question.title: Multiple Choice
question.text: 2.  More and more often, online companies are offering to “save your password”, probably to encourage people to create stronger passwords. Should you use this service?

ContentStructure.title: 3.  There are people who use their device all the time, even for online banking, but do not have anti-virus protection on the device.

Correct - Answer:  A  Of course there are, most often because of the extra cost for AV (anti-virus) software. It is much cheaper to purchase an AV package than to have your device infected, information stolen and having to pay for repairs. Some AV companies offer a free version. Do an online search, find the best AV for you, and download it!  Click anywhere or press ‘y’ to continue.

Incorrect - Answer:  A  Of course there are, most often because of the extra cost for AV (anti-virus) software. It is much cheaper to purchase an AV package than to have your device infected, information stolen and having to pay for repairs. Some AV companies offer a free version. Do an online search, find the best AV for you, and download it!  Click anywhere or press ‘y’ to continue.
You must answer the question before continuing.

question.title: Multiple Choice
question.text: 3.  There are people who use their device all the time, even for online banking, but do not have anti-virus protection on the device.

ContentStructure.title: 4.  What is the easiest method to learn if someone has made fraudulent charges on your bank or credit card accounts?
Wait until your card is rejected

answer.title: Wait until your card is rejected

ContentStructure.title: Wait until the bank contacts you

answer.title: Wait until the bank contacts you

ContentStructure.title: Correct - Answer:  B  It is best if you can detect and report any fraud on your account as quickly as possible. You should check the transactions on your accounts regularly – by receiving statements, by using the ATM, by setting up telephone banking to get your balance and transactions, or via online banking. Many people rely solely on their cards so it is important to know they are safe.  Click anywhere or press ‘y’ to continue.

Incorrect - Answer:  B  It is best if you can detect and report any fraud on your account as quickly as possible. You should check the transactions on your accounts regularly – by receiving statements, by using the ATM, by setting up telephone banking to get your balance and transactions, or via online banking. Many people rely solely on their cards so it is important to know they are safe.  Click anywhere or press ‘y’ to continue.
You must answer the question before continuing.

question.title: Multiple Choice
question.text: 4.  What is the easiest method to learn if someone has made fraudulent charges on your bank or credit card accounts?

ContentStructure.title: 5. Books are an important part of life and book readers (Kindle or Kobo) are a convenient way to have books available all the time. How should you protect your e-book reader?

Correct - Answer:  D  Anything portable can be dropped, rained on, etc. so a protective cover is worth the cost. Add a passcode – anyone who steals or finds your e-book reader cannot access your account (or your precious books), and put it in airplane mode when not downloading so it is not open to the internet and using battery power.  Click anywhere or press ‘y’ to continue.

Incorrect - Answer:  D  Anything portable can be dropped, rained on, etc. so a protective cover is worth the cost. Add a passcode – anyone who steals or finds your e-book reader cannot access your account (or your precious books), and put it in airplane mode when not downloading so it is not open to the internet and using battery power.  Click anywhere or press ‘y’ to continue.
You must answer the question before continuing.

question.title: Multiple Choice
question.text: 5. Books are an important part of life and book readers (Kindle or Kobo) are a convenient way to have books available all the time. How should you protect your e-book reader?

ContentStructure.title: 6.  Let’s talk about sexting. People of all ages are engaging in a false sense of privacy online and sending intimate photos of themselves. What are the risks involved?

Correct - Answer:  D  There are countless cases of horrible outcomes from what seemed right at the time. Despite legal controversy, underage users have been criminally charged with distributing child pornography for sending their own photos. Someone who seemed to be terrific turned out to be a predator who exploited their victim for more explicit photos. People have distributed the photos without consent. Better not to take the risks – you can never get it back.   Click anywhere or press ‘y’ to continue.

Incorrect - Answer:  D  There are countless cases of horrible outcomes from what seemed right at the time. Despite legal controversy, underage users have been criminally charged with distributing child pornography for sending their own photos. Someone who seemed to be terrific turned out to be a predator who exploited their victim for more explicit photos. People have distributed the photos without consent. Better not to take the risks – you can never get it back.   Click anywhere or press ‘y’ to continue.
You must answer the question before continuing.

question.title: Multiple Choice
question.text: 6.  Let’s talk about sexting. People of all ages are engaging in a false sense of privacy online and sending intimate photos of themselves. What are the risks involved?

ContentStructure.title: 7. The number of consumer goods that connect to the internet has exploded and security is a low priority over making money by racing products to market. If you want to join the Internet of Things world, what can you do to add security?
Change the default password on your devices

answer.title: Change the default password on your devices

ContentStructure.title: Read the user agreements to know your rights

answer.title: Read the user agreements to know your rights

ContentStructure.title: Correct - Answer:  D  Reading user license agreements is important, but in reality, most people agree rather than decline the device. Learn about the product and the information it is collecting on you and your family, including whether it has recording capability. Most important is to change the product’s default password as they are listed on the internet and searchable by hackers who can enlist your device as part of a botnet to launch cyber-attacks.   Click anywhere or press ‘y’ to continue.

Incorrect - Answer:  D  Reading user license agreements is important, but in reality, most people agree rather than decline the device. Learn about the product and the information it is collecting on you and your family, including whether it has recording capability. Most important is to change the product’s default password as they are listed on the internet and searchable by hackers who can enlist your device as part of a botnet to launch cyber-attacks.  Click anywhere or press ‘y’ to continue.
You must answer the question before continuing.

question.text: 7. The number of consumer goods that connect to the internet has exploded and security is a low priority over making money by racing products to market. If you want to join the Internet of Things world, what can you do to add security?

ContentStructure.title: 8.  Information security awareness can seem too scary and overwhelming and result in people tuning it out. How do you stay safe without all the anxiety?
Delete suspicious email with links or attachments

answer.title: Delete suspicious email with links or attachments

ContentStructure.title: Correct - Answer: D  There are many things you can do to protect your information, your privacy, your location, your contacts, your finances, your devices, and the people in your online life. If you make it a habit to follow the three security best practices listed above, you will be way ahead of the majority of online users.   Click anywhere or press ‘y’ to continue.

Incorrect - Answer:  D  There are many things you can do to protect your information, your privacy, your location, your contacts, your finances, your devices, and the people in your online life. If you make it a habit to follow the three security best practices listed above, you will be way ahead of the majority of online users.  Click anywhere or press ‘y’ to continue.
You must answer the question before continuing.
